name: Throwventure
description:
Pedro has been captured by invading aliens and he has to return to his village. But the people in the village have turned into demons?!

Help Pedro in his adventure, pick items and throw them at the aliens and the demons. 

Art by Álvaro Grela: https://www.instagram.com/ag_xene/

You can play with Keyboard+Mouse or with Controller, you choose.
